00044 istream& TkObject::putin(istream& s){
00045 
00046   s.width(50);
00047 
00048   if(!s.good()){
00049     cerr <<" Error in TkObject::putin the channel is not good"<<endl;
00050     return s;
00051   }
00052   s>> name;
00053   if (s.eof()) return s;
00054   if(!s.good()){
00055     cerr <<" Error in TkObject::putin the channel is not good"<<endl;
00056     return s;
00057   }
00058   s>> pos;
00059   if(!s.good()){
00060     cerr <<" Error in TkObject::putin the channel is not good"<<endl;
00061     return s;
00062   }
00063   s>> rot;
00064   if(!s.good()){
00065     cerr <<" Error in TkObject::putin the channel is not good"<<endl;
00066     return s;
00067   }
00068   s>> posA;
00069   if(!s.good()){
00070     cerr <<" Error in TkObject::putin the channel is not good"<<endl;
00071     return s;
00072   }
00073   s>> rotA;
00074   if(!s.good()){
00075     cerr <<" Error in TkObject::putin the channel is not good"<<endl;
00076     return s;
00077   }
00078 
00079   return s;
00080 }

00119 void TkObject::RotToMat(number nrm[][3]){
00120   
00121   for (int row=0;row<3;row++)
00122     for (int col=0;col<3;col++)
00123       nrm[row][col]=rot.GetEl(row,col);
00124   return;
00125 }
